hero.title: From curiosity to conservation
hero.subtitle: Continuing their work with support for rigorous, open marine science.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.p1: We support field research from fjords to the open ocean, invest in open data and transparent methods, and back the people and tools that make marine science reproducible and useful. By sharing results widely and partnering with communities, educators, and policymakers, we help transform discovery into decisions that restore habitats, safeguard species, and sustain the ocean for future generations.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.p1: Have questions about our work or how you can get involved?
contactUs.p2: We'd love to hear from you.
